Summary: Again A Few Objects Hovering Over Lake Michigan
trends: There have been 221 other sightings in Chicago
There were no other sightings in Chicago on or around October 18th 2011
divs: sighting detailsnow it was tuesday very early morning october 18, 2011, again i was on my way to work that morning, while i was riding on the cta north shore purple line train; which was at the break of dawn around 6:30pm. i was heading up towards the cta howard station, i happen to look out the window and i���������ve seen several strange looking lights up in the sky towards the east over by lake michigan. this time, i���������ve gotten my old blue digital aptek pocket video camcorder with me, and i finally have got it on film believe it or not. hope that these video clips would help out with this investigation. please let me know the out come of this ufo business out over by lake michigan, and tell me what is going on here! i hope that i am not trying to get any attention but this is what i keep on seeing from time to time in the mornings on my way to work. note i tried sending the file links but the files were either too or too big to send. please copy and past the links to the youtube website page [links moved to field investigator section\cms\tg] thank you very much
